casebody.data:
JOS. T. GRIFFIN COMPANY, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 7809. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. March 16, 1939. Steinfeld & Steinfeld, of Louisville, Ky., for appellant. Eli H. Brown, III, U. S. Atty;, of Louisville, Ky.

Before HICKS, SIMONS, and ALLEN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This cause was heard on the transcript, briefs and argument of counsel, and it appearing that it was not error to sustain the demurrer to the petition, it is therefore ordered and adjudged that the judgment appealed from be, and the same is, affirmed.
